column6: She's been gone for a long time, but she's coming back.  This isn't a hoax.  This isn't a joke.  KITTY PRYDE is back in this over-sized special issue of UNCANNY X-MEN. Rated T  ...$3.99
column8: | penciller:Terry Dodson | penciller:Phil Jimenez | penciller:Whilce Portacio | writer:Matt Fraction
